tags.name: zui-button
tags.description:
### Example
```html
<zui-button>
   Add a contact
</zui-button>

<zui-button class="secondary">
   <zui-icon icon="zui-add"></zui-icon>
   Add a contact
</zui-button>

<zui-button class="icon-only">
   <zui-icon icon="zui-add"></zui-icon>
</zui-button>
```

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Use this attribute when you want to disable `zui-button`

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Use this attribute when you want to disable `zui-button`
